üöÄ Quick Install (3 minutes)

1 Download the Add-in

Download the manifest file that tells Excel how to load the add-in:

üì• Download manifest.xml

2 Install in Excel

Excel Desktop (Windows/Mac):

  1. Open Excel
  2. Go to: Insert ‚Üí My Add-ins (or Office Add-ins)
  3. Click Upload My Add-in (or Manage My Add-ins)
  4. Click Browse and select the manifest.xml file you downloaded
  5. Click Upload

Excel Online:

  1. Open office.com and sign in
  2. Open any Excel workbook
  3. Go to: Insert ‚Üí Office Add-ins
  4. Click Upload My Add-in
  5. Upload the manifest.xml file

3 Get Your FREE API Key

4 Start Using!

  1. Click the AI Assistant button in the Excel ribbon (Home tab)
  2. Click the ‚öôÔ∏è Settings icon
  3. Paste your API key
  4. Start chatting with your Excel data! üéâ
üí° Tips
  • The add-in can read all your sheet data to provide context-aware answers
  • Ask questions like: "Analyze column B" or "Create a formula to sum sales"
  • Your API key is stored locally in your browser - never sent to our servers

‚ùì Troubleshooting

Add-in won't load?

  • Make sure you're using a modern version of Excel (2016 or later)
  • Try clearing Excel's cache: Close Excel, delete %LOCALAPPDATA%\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Wef\
  • For Excel Online, try a different browser (Chrome, Edge, Firefox)

API calls failing?

  • Double-check your API key is correct (copy/paste carefully)
  • OpenRouter keys start with sk-or-v1-
  • Try a different model in Settings
